description: General server metrics view: CPU, Memory, Network, Disk usages

panels.content:
#### use the selectors above to change tracked server, filesystems, and block devices, **but do not save your changes on exiting**

*If you save changes when exiting, rainforests will burn. You do not want to burn rainforests.*

##### Grafana tips

* `Click` on metric names to isolate them
* `SHIFT`+`Click` on metric names to disable them
* `CTRL`+`Click` on metric names to toggle them
* `CTRL`+`Click` or `CTRL`+`Drag` on metric graphs to annotate them
* Use the timeframe button on top right to change the amount of viewed history
* Click the "tips" row to collapse it
